How to switch up your monster team
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Battles: How to switch up your monster team
By Eagle_Fierce on Thursday, April 27, 2000 - 09:00 pm:

I've finally figured out how to switch up teams in MR: Battlecards. All that you must do is go to the "Team Edit" and choose which moster card to use. Once you have done this, you should see a display of the monster, and techniques. Choose "Use" or "Remove" from the new options list (pressing "A" button). "Use" applies the card chosen to the deck, while "Remove" takes the card back out and puts it in the "Team Box". Please note, that you will need to remove cards from the already existing mosters in the deck, or you will still draw their cards in battle. You may only have a total of 50 cards in a deck.

My current team (now that I learned to revise my deck) is Tiger (good combos), Golem (powerful moves), and Pixie (cheap techniques, and an unstopable "Lightning" (^_^ MUAHAHAHAHAH) PLUS the ability to heal an ally by three lives.

Once you are finished, choose "Team to Go" from the card menu, and you have successfully switched characters, techniques, etc. Happy ranching!
